title: ninaivAi manidA
sahitya:
ninaivAi manidA inda nilavuyir yAvaiyum ninnuyir ennavE


anupallavi

  tanai arinda jnAnikkut-tAnE ulagellAm taNmalar pala vENum paNNum pUjai onrAm


caraNam    karuppup-pashu maDiyir-karanda pAl karuppAmO kATSigaL mAriDin kaNmaNi mArumO
veruppu viruppillAdu virivAga nOkkinAl vEru vEruDalE visaiyoru shaktiyE
